name: Goji Farm
description:
Goji Farm is our first Goji Play game that allows you to play with or without exercising. Manage your crops at your own leisure, or play "Farm Work" and exercise to water crops and earn currency faster!

Goji Farm is a farming resource game that has you growing crops to make deliciously healthy smoothies. Gameplay involves various aspects of farm management, such as planting, growing, harvesting, raising livestock, and selling your smoothies to new customers!

Goji Farm focuses on ingredients that fit a healthy life style: blueberries, raspberries, cinnamon, kale, bananas, avocados, honey and fat-free yogurt. Use over 34 ingredients to prepare the smoothies your fit customers are asking for and start building a super healthy body!

Earn Goji Coins that can be used to unlock seeds, structures, and animals by exercising using Goji Play! How many smoothies can you create and sell in one session?
